snippet.title: [Official] MINImax Tinyverse Trailer
snippet.description:
MINImax Tinyverse First Official Trailer.

Watch princess Aidel of Aillai facing her most hated enemy, the assassin Kaya of Creaea, in the battlefield at the doors of Ortto’s territory.

In this fierce battle, both sides are supported by players, like you, who have discovered the Tinyverse and who are ready to assist each respective realm with diverse skills without the tiny inhabitants of the Tinyverse noticing the actual presence of the players.

The forces of Aidel and Kaya will continue clashing on their own, but the players supporting them will control the flow of the battle helping them to obtain the final victory to this endless war.

For your realm!

Wishlist MINImax Tinyverse on Steam: https://bit.ly/2MOajsm
Join MINImax Tinyverse Community : https://discord.gg/minimaxtinyverse

#minimaxtinyverse #game #steam
